alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 5:31PM CDT until May 30 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TREGO AND NORTHWESTERN ELLIS COUNTIES... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ogallah, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Trego and northwestern Ellis Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
